11:53 <evalica> vmassol: Vincent do you know why this page is deleted http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki44M1 ?  
11:54 <vmassol> evalica: hi  
11:54 <vmassol> because 4.4M1 doesn't exist :)  
11:55 <evalica> k - I need to update some links  
11:55 <vmassol> we skipped it  
11:55 <vmassol> and went direct to 4.4RC1  
11:55 <evalica> k I understand  
11:56 <evalica> i forgot :P  
11:57 <vmassol> ok :)

15:31 <sdumitriu> mflorea: Pong from yesterday  
16:13 <mflorea> sdumitriu: I was just unsure whether to use "Office Server" or "office server" in translation messages (when not inside a title)  
16:14 <mflorea> I used "Office Server" in the end, thinking it represents a known "entity"  
16:20 <sdumitriu> +1  
16:20 <sdumitriu> No, let's say +0.5  
16:21 <sdumitriu> I hope that users \_do\_ know what an Office Server is  
16:21 <sdumitriu> But I can't think of anything better  
16:38 <mflorea> yes, me neither
